SQL.Question: SELECT SOFT_QUESTION_ID FROM ELP_SOFT_QUESTION WHERE CODE = :cODE AND trunc(EFFECTIVE,'DDD') = :Effective AND SOFT_QUESTION_ID != :entity_Id
SQL.Answer: SELECT ANSWER_ID FROM ELP_ANSWER WHERE CODE = :cODE AND trunc(EFFECTIVE,'DDD') = :Effective AND ANSWER_ID != :entity_Id
SQL.Rule: SELECT RULE_ID FROM ELP_RULE WHERE CODE = :cODE AND trunc(EFFECTIVE,'DDD') = :Effective AND RULE_ID != :entity_Id
SQL.PriceList: SELECT PRICE_LIST_ID FROM ELP_PRICE_LIST WHERE CODE = :CODE AND TRUNC(EFFECTIVE,'DDD') = :EFFECTIVE AND PRICE_LIST_ID != :entity_Id
